entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM Client has no access token despite successful login and scope on Program.cs #47601
  • Exit Kestrel heartbeat thread immediately on stop #47600
  • Add JSON file and UserSecrets configuration providers, and console logging w/ configuration to CreateSlimBuilder #47598
  • [Java Client] HTTP errors during WebSocket handshake not surfaced as HttpRequestExceptions #47597
  • Optimistic Concurrency Lock Support in `IDistributedCache` #47596
  • The new FormInputRenderMode option adds unnecessary noise to query strings #47593
  • add database and table by wizard in blazor united #47592
  • add user role permissions for blazor united #47591
  • Google auth sign in without User becoming authenticated #47590
  • [SignalR] Avoid initial memory allocation in ChannelBasedSemaphore #47588
  • Routing: DfaMatcher match error when literal constrain appears twice in the path segment #47587
    .NET 8 Planning
  • BLAZOR: Integrate CSS (including preprocessors) into .razor files #47586
    Backlog
  • Support DisplayNameAttribute on record properties #47585
  • Open Id Connect cookies are being block by Gateway WAF #47583
  • Multiple Authorize Attributes in MinAPI generates "AuthenticationScheme: Bearer was forbidden." #47581

Closed

  • Hash routing to named element #8393
    8.0-preview4
  • Should razor support syntax for call child component method from parent component? #47500
  • Example in section triggers an exception with the message 'For a dotnetjs resource, custom loaders must supply a URI string' #47589
  • Gets the authorization attribute that has a higher priority on the Action #47361
  • support multiple JSON serialization settings with Newtonsoft.Json in ASP.NET Core #47516
  • Sunset Microsoft.AspNetCore.ConcurrencyLimiter #47532
  • Object reference error from DefaultHttpRequest.set_RouteValues #47573

PullRequests

Created

  • Make HttpLogging middleware endpoint aware #47595
    area-runtime
  • Return 400 bad request when IOException is thrown when ready form. #47584
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • [release/6.0] Try skipping tests with Japanese chars #47560
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.17
  • Enable StripSymbols under API template when -aot is passed in. #47582
    area-grpc, area-minimal, 8.0-preview4
  • Obsolete concurrency limiter middleware. #47571
    breaking-change, area-runtime, needs-breaking-change-announcement, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Fix Heartbeat logging after disposal #47580
    area-runtime
  • Add metrics to ASP.NET Core #46834
    area-runtime
